marklogic.body:
some time this week, Shiver: Poltergeist CE, the sequel to Shiver: Hitchhiker, by the same developer as the Treasure Seekers series and Depths of Betrayal.
also, Monument Builder: Titanic, a time mgt game. you might recall Monument Builder: Eiffel Tower.
still keeping watch for Alchemy Mysteries: Prague Legends... Dark Alleys: Penumbra Motel... PuppetShow: Return to Joyville... and... Eye: The Sacrifice.
the 1st 3 PuppetShow games were great. the 1st Tiger Eye was 2 years ago. ASG has them all, of course.
